H0.text: Flashlights and extra batteries are the items most useful at home during a power failure.

H1.text: Hats and sunscreen are the items that would be most useful at home during a power failure.

H2.text: Raincoats and umbrellas are the items most useful at home during a power failure.

H3.text: Insect spray and jackets are the items that would be most useful at home during a power failure.

A4.text: Flashlights are used as a light source outdoors, in places without permanently installed lighting, during power outages, or when a portable light source is needed.

A5.text: Power-failure lights are designed to keep their batteries charged from a wall plug and to automatically turn on after an AC power failure; the power-failure light can be removed from the wall socket and used as a portable flashlight.
